# bodyB

**Instance Property**

The second physics body connected by the joint.

## Declaration

```swift
var bodyB: SCNPhysicsBody? { get }
```

## Discussion

This property’s value is `nil` if the joint was created using the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNPhysicsBallSocketJoint/init(body:anchor:)] method.

## Managing the Characteristics of a Ball and Socket Joint

- **bodyA**: The first physics body connected by the joint.
- **anchorA**: The point at which the joint connects, relative to the node containing the first body.
- **anchorB**: The point at which the joint connects, relative to the node containing the second body.
